title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 September 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (19/09/2008 05:00): XWiki.XiaoMeng was modified by XWiki.XiaoMeng (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XiaoMeng  
xwikibot - (19/09/2008 08:25): AdminGuide.InstallationJBoss was modified by xwiki:XWiki.tmkarthi (Added comment) - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationJBoss  
vmassol - (19/09/2008 10:45): good morning  
vmassol - (19/09/2008 10:46): quick question: in the rendering when there are several contiguous spaces do we send several onSpace events or only a single one with the number of spaces ?  
vmassol - (19/09/2008 10:46): I think we send several onSpace events  
vmassol - (19/09/2008 10:46): wdyt?  
vmassol - (19/09/2008 10:48): (btw the onSpace event is currently a static object so there's no object creation, it just creates more events in the XDOM)  
vmassol - (19/09/2008 10:49): btw for special symbols we send them one by one  
vmassol - (19/09/2008 10:49): ok I'll send everything one by one for now and we can change that later on if it causes problems  
thomasmortagne - (19/09/2008 10:50): for me it should ba the same than for onNewLine  
vmassol - (19/09/2008 10:52): new lines are sent one by one too  
thomasmortagne - (19/09/2008 10:53): yes  
xwikibot - (19/09/2008 11:33): Main.ReleaseNotes was modified by XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotes  
xwikibot - (19/09/2008 12:46): XWiki.angel was modified by XWiki.angel (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/angel  
xwikibot - (19/09/2008 12:54): Snippets.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.angel (Added comment) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Snippets/  
xwikibot - (19/09/2008 13:18): Snippets.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Added comment) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Snippets/  
xwikibot - (19/09/2008 13:22): Snippets.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.angel (Added comment) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Snippets/  
xwikibot - (19/09/2008 13:33): XWiki.MaximKangin was modified by XWiki.MaximKangin (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/MaximKangin  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 13:51): mflorea: I now have 8 problems stacking up... ;) (I have fixed already 3-4 but will need another 5-6 hours to finish them all)  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 13:52): thomasmortagne, sdumitriu , mflorea, jvelociter: if you could vote quickly on the mail I've just sent that would help me  
sdumitriu - (19/09/2008 13:52): Sure  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 13:52): (and Asiri too if you want!)  
mflorea - (19/09/2008 13:53): vmassol\_: done  
jvelociter - (19/09/2008 13:55): vmassol\_: doing it  
jvelociter - (19/09/2008 13:55): vmassol\_: "~~" is nothing special in the new syntax, right ?  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 13:56): jvelociter: nope, been replaced by //  
jvelociter - (19/09/2008 13:56): ok  
Denis - (19/09/2008 13:56): vmassol\_:  I have tried the list regarding my issue of yesterday, seems that nobody knows :(  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 13:56): who wants to practice extreme programming: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xczAJctmdH0 ;)  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 13:57): Denis: be patient...   
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 13:57): people are busy  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 13:57): try to find the answer by yourself first, wait a few more days (3-4 days) and then ask again  
Denis - (19/09/2008 13:58): vmassol\_:  I have already dig in the code, but I really do not understand the goal behind such behaviour  
Denis - (19/09/2008 14:00): vmassol\_:  very extreme ! not so busy ;)  
xwikibot - (19/09/2008 14:43): Design.ApplicationManager\_proposals was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/ApplicationManager\_proposals  
Asiri\_ - (19/09/2008 14:51): who is Asiri\_ ? not me ... :-?  
Asiri\_ - (19/09/2008 14:51): oops ..   
Asiri\_ - (19/09/2008 14:51): ok it's me .. funny ..  
sdumitriu - (19/09/2008 14:52): Asiri\_: You must ghost the other nickname first  
Asiri\_ - (19/09/2008 14:52): what is tha ? :(  
Asiri\_ - (19/09/2008 14:52): no idea how to do it ..  
sdumitriu - (19/09/2008 14:52): Try: /msg nickserv ghost Asiri  
Asiri\_ - (19/09/2008 14:53): hmmm, not working, it's ok .. this is temporary i think ..  
Asiri\_ - (19/09/2008 14:53): :)  
sdumitriu - (19/09/2008 14:54): Actually you must also provide the password  
sdumitriu - (19/09/2008 14:55): So it's /msg nickserv ghost Asiri yourpassword  
Asiri\_ - (19/09/2008 14:55): oh .. ok, let me try again ..  
Asiri\_ - (19/09/2008 14:55): aha .. got it ..   
Asiri\_ - (19/09/2008 14:55): thanks sergiu .. :)  
sdumitriu - (19/09/2008 15:00): What's the curriki mailing list address?  
sdumitriu - (19/09/2008 15:02): vmassol\_: Do you know?  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 15:03): sdumitriu: I don't know for sure  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 15:03): xipe\_: can you help us?  
sdumitriu - (19/09/2008 15:06): [[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)?  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 15:18): sdumitriu: this needs to be added to xwiki.org MailingLists page  
sdumitriu - (19/09/2008 15:49): vmassol\_: Was XE 1.5.2 released?  
sdumitriu - (19/09/2008 15:49): It doesn't appear so in Jira  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 15:49): sdumitriu: it's supposed to be released by thomas  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 16:53): starting the change from \ to ~ for escapes...  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 16:53): mflorea: any update from your side on the bugs? Still ok to fix them all for monday? :)  
mflorea - (19/09/2008 16:57): vmassol\_ :( I hope, but there is still a lot to do. I'll what I can do during the weekend. I have 4 bugs on FF to fix and 2 on IE. In the case of FF the good part is that I have implemented the Selection/Range stuff so it will be relatively easy to fix those 4. For IE it's a different thing. I'll see what I can do. But I think we should release Monday and continue to fix till the final release.   
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 16:58): well Monday \*is\* the final release  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 16:58): :)  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 16:58): (mflorea)  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 16:59): the process is that RC1 is... well... a release candidate  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 16:59): which means that unless a major bug is found it's going to be "rename" to final  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 17:00): so we can't release a RC1 if we know of major bugs that have to be fixed before the final  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 17:00): this is why we postponed RC1 to next Monday by giving it one more week  
mflorea - (19/09/2008 17:02): oh, I didn't knew RC1=final. Then I'll do my best during the weekend and we'll talk Monday morning  
mflorea - (19/09/2008 17:02): is it ok?  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 17:20): mflorea: yes  
vmassol\_ - (19/09/2008 17:20): I'll do the same...

Asiri\_ - (19/09/2008 19:41): ganymede is giving me probs .. :(  
Asiri\_ - (19/09/2008 19:42): ganymede+subclipse+m2eclipse seems not to work well ... crashes here and there .. thinking of switching back to good old europa ..
